response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, but I understand its worth extends far beyond monetary terms to you. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $850,000, a significant discount from its market value of $1,000,000. This opportunity is exclusive to you and represents an extraordinary chance to own something truly unique and valuable.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We are confident that once you experience the quality and craftsmanship of this product, you will appreciate its true worth even more.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 850000}
